rWishart
  • @ bearstatistics.com
  • Reference

Singular Wishart Helper Function

Singular Wishart Helper Function

SingularWishart(df, Sigma, covariance = FALSE)

Arguments

df
degrees of freedom
Sigma
Covariance matrix
covariance
should covariance matrix be generated (X / df)

Value

list or array of random wishart matrices

Examples

SingularWishart(5, diag(1, 20))
